price: Naho ba bandi babashyigikiye mu bahawe igitabo,[1] (Allah) abamanura mu nyubako zabo (ndende) z’imitamenwa, anabateza ubwoba mu mitima. Bityo, bamwe murabica abandi mubagira ingaruzwamuheto.
arabic: وَأَنزَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَٰهَرُوهُم مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِن صَيَاصِيهِمۡ وَقَذَفَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلرُّعۡبَ فَرِيقٗا تَقۡتُلُونَ وَتَأۡسِرُونَ فَرِيقٗا
footnotes: [1] Abahawe igitabo bavugwa aha ni Abayahudi babaga i Madina bo mu bwoko bwa Bani Qurayidhwa.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-anzala alladhīna ẓāharūhum min ahli al-kitābi min ṣayāṣīhim waqadhafa fī qulūbihimu al-ruʿ'ba farīqan taqtulūna watasirūna farīqan
